usage.cn: 长大，成为你自己，是件需要很大勇气的事情。- E.E.Cummings
usage.eng: It take courage to grow up and turn out to be who you really are.

usage.cn: 如果我们有勇气去追求，我们所有的梦想都可以成为现实。 ——Walt Disney（华特迪士尼）
usage.eng: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

usage.cn: 什么是勇气？是哭着要你爱我，还是哭着让你离开。
usage.eng: What is courage?Is it making you love me with tears or letting you go with tears?

usage.cn: 别让别人的观念埋没了自己内在的声音，要有勇气跟随自己的心与直觉，这才是最最重要的。
usage.eng: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drowns out your own inner voice, and most important，have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
